bioconda.name: bioconductor-safe
bioconda.summary: Significance Analysis of Function and Expression

biotools.summary: Resampling-based method for testing functional categories in gene expression experiments. It can be applied to 2-sample and multi-class comparisons, or simple linear regressions. Other experimental designs can also be accommodated through user-defined functions.

bioschemas.name: safe
bioschemas.summary: Resampling-based method for testing functional categories in gene expression experiments. It can be applied to 2-sample and multi-class comparisons, or simple linear regressions. Other experimental designs can also be accommodated through user-defined functions.
